DOC.brief_title: Hormonal Contraception Healthy Young Men ( P42306 ) ( COMPLETED ) ( P06057 )
DOC.criteria: Male Mentally physically healthy BMI 18 32 kg/m^2 Two pretreatment semen sample > 20 million/ml normal morphology motility History presence psychiatric disease , liver disease , renal disease , diabetes , cardiovascular disease , malignancy , prostatic disease , genitourinary infection PSA > 2.5 ng/ml Use drug know interfere pharmacokinetics steroid Use lipidlowering drug
